"About this Quest":
"This quest automatically clears when the time limit is reached.

When Quest Points are above a certain level, rare enemies and boosted enemies have a higher chance to appear.

Work together with your party to defeat as many enemies as you can within the time limit!"

"In this quest, you will not be able to collect items dropped by enemies until you clear the quest.

You can collect all dropped items in the transfer area at the end of the quest."
